description: From Middle English astonien, astunien, equivalent to a- +â€Ž stun. See also astone, astonish.

verbs.description: astony (third-person singular simple present astonies, present participle astonying, simple past and past participle astonied)

examples: Verily the violence of a griefe, being extreme, must needs astonie the mind, and hinder the liberty of her actions.
